thread.title: A new US-India alliance is a mortal threat to terrorism: Shalabh Kumar
thread.title_full: A new US-India alliance is a mortal threat to terrorism: Shalabh Kumar

author: PTI
title: A new US-India alliance is a mortal threat to terrorism: Shalabh Kumar
text:
A new US-India alliance is a mortal threat to terrorism: Shalabh Kumar A new US-India alliance is a mortal threat to terrorism: Shalabh Kumar A top Indian-American Republican supporter today said that a new Indo-US alliance is a "mortal" threat to terrorism everywhere. By: PTI | Washington | Published: February 22, 2017 3:35 AM A top Indian-American Republican supporter today said that a new Indo-US alliance is a “mortal” threat to terrorism everywhere. (Reuters) 
A top Indian-American Republican supporter today said that a new Indo-US alliance is a “mortal” threat to terrorism everywhere. “President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Modi together are the worst enemies of terrorists. The two are kindred spirits: committed nationalists and willing to forego the niceties of the political elites in both countries to get things done on behalf of a population eager for more jobs and economic growth,” said Shalabh Kumar, founder of the Republican Hindu Coalition said in an op-ed in Breit Bart News. 
You May Also Like To Watch This: 
Kumar said a deepened relationship between the US and India is already advancing the war against “Islamic” extremism by leaps and bounds. Trump and Modi, both proud unapologetic patriots and champions of entrepreneurialism, have been friendly for a while, he noted.
